detail_desc: Cardigan in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, ribbed stand-up collar, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the cardigan is organic.
Dress in a patterned cotton weave with a round neckline and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with narrow elastication, and gathered tiers to the hem.
Dress in a patterned cotton weave with a round neckline and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with narrow elastication, and gathered tiers to the hem.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders, a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Gently tailored, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Pockets in the side seams and covered elastication at the hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Cardigan in a soft cable knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Cropped, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Longer, straight-cut jacket in sturdy cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Chest pockets with a flap and button, patch front pockets and one inner pocket. Unlined. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Tops in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric, one printed. Long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tops in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric, one printed. Long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Wide, gently draping trousers in a soft, fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Regular, elasticated waist.

Tunic in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a collar, concealed buttons at the top, open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Cropped, fitted sports top with short sleeves and wide ribbing at the hem. The sports top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. The polyamide content of the top is partly recycled.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and pair of shorts in soft, ribbed jersey. Top with a press-stud placket and long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and pair of shorts in soft, ribbed jersey. Top with a press-stud placket and long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Oversized pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in soft, ribbed jersey. T-shirt with narrow ribbing around the neckline and low dropped shoulders. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Oversized pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in soft, ribbed jersey. T-shirt with narrow ribbing around the neckline and low dropped shoulders. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Pyjama bottoms in ribbed jersey. Regular waist with a visible elastic waistband and wide legs with overlocked hems.
Fitted pyjama top and shorts in soft, ribbed cotton jersey. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck and narrow, elasticated shoulder straps. Shorts with visible elastication at the waist.

Pyjamas with a vest top and pair of leggings in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend. Top with a V-shaped opening at the top. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist, a vertical seam down the legs and a slit at the hems.
Joggers in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with cuffed hems.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with a stand-up collar, yoke at the back and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, diagonal jetted chest pockets, discreet pockets in the side seams and a trimmed hem.

T-shirt and joggers set with print motifs. Classic T-shirt in cotton jersey. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide, easy pull-on, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Relaxed style with a low crotch, welt pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and ribbed hems.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying fabric with a wide panel with a concealed inner pocket, drawstring and D-ring at the waist. Two leg pockets, one with an extra compartment and zip. Flatlock seams.
Plastic bucket in a spooky shape with a handle at the top.
Ballet pumps in soft imitation leather with a decorative metal buckle at the front. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 1 cm.
Short, A-line dress in velour with a deep V-neck and long, wide sleeves with narrow cuffs. Gathered seams under the bust and at the hips for added width. Unlined.

Short, straight-style dress in mesh. Round neckline with a small frilled collar, a smocked yoke at the front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Skirt with a seam at the hem, and overlocked edges around the collar and hem. Fitted inner dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Short, A-line dress in an airy weave with a deep V-neck, gathered, asymmetric seams for added width and long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Patterned fabric-covered Alice band.

Blouse in an airy, crinkled weave made from recycled polyester with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed trim around the neckline, long sleeves and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted, padded sections on the shoulders. Small stand-up collar with a press-stud, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Shirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Calf-length skirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with buttons down the front and a high waist with covered elastication at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Top in soft jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Top in soft jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy and covered elastication at the hems.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy and covered elastication at the hems.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and ties at one side.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and ties at one side.
Socks in a soft, fine, rib-knit cotton blend, with elasticated tops. Three pairs contain glittery threads.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline and ribbed cuffs.

Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey made from a cotton blend. Top with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and trims around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and cuffed hems.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed cotton jersey with overlocked edges at cuffs and hem. One top with an all-over print.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed cotton jersey with overlocked edges at cuffs and hem. One top with an all-over print.
Set with a matching iPhone case and protective AirPod case in plastic. The AirPod case has a cap and an eyelet in one side.
Set with a matching iPhone case and protective AirPod case in plastic. The AirPod case has a cap and an eyelet in one side.
Set with a matching iPhone case and protective AirPod case in plastic. The AirPod case has a cap and an eyelet in one side.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Set with a top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Set with a top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in imitation leather with a collar, rounded notch lapels and shoulder tabs. Storm flap with a button and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable tab and buckle at the cuffs, diagonal welt pockets at the sides, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a brushed finish. High waist and a concealed zip in one side. Recycled polyester lining.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a brushed finish. High waist and a concealed zip in one side. Recycled polyester lining.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a brushed finish. High waist and a concealed zip in one side. Recycled polyester lining.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail. The polyester content of the scrunchie is partly recycled.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail. The polyester content of the scrunchie is partly recycled.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail. The polyester content of the scrunchie is partly recycled.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Flatlock seams around the neckline and hem.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Long, block-coloured sleeves with a seam at the elbows, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Iron-on fabric patch to patch and repair garments. Size approx. 12 cm.
